definitions.text: (biology) the process of an individual organism growing organically; a purely biological unfolding of events involved in an organism changing gradually from a simple to a more complex level
examples: he proposed an indicator of osseous development in children

definitions.text: a progression from simpler to more complex forms
a process of becoming larger or longer or more numerous or more important

examples: the only growth was some salt grass

definitions.text: the gradual beginning or coming forth
examples: figurines presage the emergence of sculpture in Greece

definitions.text: (pathology) an abnormal proliferation of tissue (as in a tumor)
